=== Overview ===

It should be possible to minimize QtTube to the system tray and restore it back from there.

<nowiki>[[https://blueprints.launchpad.net/qttube/+spec/minimize-tray|See this blueprint on Launchpad.]]</nowiki>

=== Technical Information ===

This feature will make use of Qt4's <nowiki>[[http://www.riverbankcomputing.com/Docs/PyQt4/html/qsystemtrayicon.html|QSystemTrayIcon class]]</nowiki>.
